name: Spicy Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Drizzle chicken cutlets with oil and season generously with chipotle chili powder, paprika, Italian herb blend, salt, pepper, garlic, and onion.
Heat oil in a pan, add chicken, and cook until nicely charred.
Add onions to the same pan, scraping up the browned bits.
Add grass-fed butter to the pan and melt.
Stir in heavy cream and chicken cooking juices.
Cook fettuccine pasta until almost done.
Add pasta to the sauce and let it absorb the sauce.
Top with blackened chicken and parsley flakes.
